text:
New property – Centra Maris Resort Jomtien
Centara Hotels&Resorts is pleased to be introducing their newest property in Thailand, Centra Maris Resort Jomtien, scheduled to open mid-December 2015. Just a short skip out of Bangkok, Jomtien Beach has a new perspective from that of its nearby neighbor, Pattaya. There has been major investment in the area that provides many attractive elements. Centara’s new property will offer a full range of services that will allow for every guest to enjoy their stay.
The new property features 282 rooms, suites and residences in total, all designed with a fresh modern style, incorporating clean lines, light wood furnishings and splashes of vivid colors. All offer free Wi-Fi, and comfortable living spaces of up to 60 square meters with the option of garden or ocean views. Pool Suites and Family Residences come complete with a private garden and plunge pool, while each residence can sleep up to 3 adults or 2 adults and 3 children.
Family-friendly facilities are a specialty of Centara and this new resort property definitely has a lot to offer, to even the littlest of guests. Children will be consumed in an environment unlike anything else, with a whimsically themed Kids’ Club, with Camp Safari for the youngest ones and a teenage-friendly E-Zone where there are engaging activities to keep kids of all ages entertained. Other facilities worth exploring are the lagoon-shaped swimming pool complete with Jacuzzis as well as a children’s water play area and water slide.
For adults, the ‘Cense by SPA Cenvaree’ is a perfect escape. Step into a world of tranquility and pampering with an extensive spa facility that is set over two floors and takes guests on a journey through the healing traditions of Southeast Asia. Guests can choose from a broad range of therapies, including massage, body treatment and facials that feature Thai herbs, floral extracts and aromatic oils. A fitness center also allows for further rejuvenation for the body and mind.
Dining options include an all-day dining venue serving varied buffet-style breakfasts, and an international and Thai a la carte menu for lunch and dinner with indoor and outdoor dining options. The resort’s poolside restaurant offers an eclectic selection of quality food&drink, serving everything from fresh seafood and fish to chops and steaks, and perfect burgers with modern twists. In-room dining is available throughout the day, and the swim-up pool bar is another appealing feature for adult guests.
Source:- Centra Maris Resort
